levels.description:
Each attack deals <@ba.vup>{attack@s2.atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical splash damage
<$ba.overdrive>Overload</>: Each attack deals <@ba.vup>{attack@s2.magic_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as extra <@ba.vup>Arts</> splash damage. If cancelled manually, fire all remaining bullets, and lose <@ba.vdown>{attack@s2.hp_ratio:0%}</>HP
<@ba.rem>Skill has 10 ammo and can be manually deactivated</>
